title: Kreator - Endless Pain 1985 (bonus tracks) [EAC-WV]
description:
Kreator - Endless Pain (1985). Reissue with four bonus tracks from the "End of the World" demo, which was released when the band was still known as Tormentor, as bonus tracks.

1. Endless Pain
2. Total Death
3. Storm of the Beast
4. Tormentor
5. Son of Evil
6. Flag of Hate
7. Cry War
8. Bone Breaker
9. Living in Fear
10. Dying Victims

bonus tracks:

11. Armies of Hell
12. Tormentor
13. Cry War
14. Bonebreaker

Ripped by Exact Audio Copy and packed to ISO.WV file container. Drop .wv to foobar2000 and listen. Or rename to .iso and open with WinRAR or CD emulator program (Alcohol 120%, for example). ISO contains also scans of CD covers.

ENJOY!
THRASH TILL DEATH!
